parameters.name: Platforms
parameters.description:
Architecture for image building. Valid values:

*   `linux/amd64`
*   `linux/arm64`
*   `linux/386`
*   `linux/arm/v7`
*   `inux/arm/v6`

Default value: `linux/amd64`

parameters.name: PushName
parameters.description: The name of the push that triggers the building rule.

parameters.name: PushType
parameters.description:
The type of the push that triggers the building rule. Valid values:

*   `GIT_TAG`: tag push
*   `GIT_BRANCH`: branch push

parameters.name: RepoId
parameters.description: The ID of the image repository.
